workflow.name: Instant infographic generator (LINE + Nano Banana Pro)
workflow.description:
## About This Template
This workflow turns complex data or topics sent via LINE into beautiful, easy-to-understand Infographics.

It combines **Gemini** (to analyze data and structure the visual layout) and **Nano Banana Pro** (accessed via Kie.ai API) to generate high-quality, data-rich graphics (Charts, timelines, processes).

## How It Works
1.  **Input:** User sends a topic or data points via LINE (e.g., "Japan's Energy Mix: 20% Solar, 10% Wind...").
2.  **Data Visualization Logic:** Gemini acts as an Information Designer, deciding the best chart type (Pie, Bar, Flow) and layout for the data.
3.  **Render:** Nano Banana generates a professional **3:4 Vertical Infographic**.
4.  **Smart Polling:** The workflow uses a loop to check the API status every 5 seconds, ensuring it waits exactly as long as needed.
5.  **Delivery:** Uploads to S3 and sends the visual report back to LINE.

## Who It‚Äôs For
* Social Media Managers needing quick visual content.
* Educators and presenters summarizing data.
* Consultants creating quick visual reports on the go.

## Requirements
* **n8n** (Cloud or Self-hosted).
* **Kie.ai API Key** (Nano Banana Pro).
* **Google Gemini API Key**.
* **AWS S3 Bucket** (Public access).
* **LINE Official Account**.

## Setup Steps
1.  **Credentials:** Configure Header Auth for Kie.ai and your other service credentials.
2.  **Webhook:** Add the production URL to LINE Developers console.

parameters.content:
## 1. Data Processing
1. Extract data/topic from LINE.
2. **Gemini acts as Data Analyst**.
3. Structures the data into a visual description (Charts, Icons, Layout).

## 2. Infographic Rendering
1. Submit to Nano Banana Pro.
2. **Configured for 3:4 Aspect Ratio**.
3. **Smart Loop:** Checks status every 5s until ready.

## 3. Host & Deliver
1. Download the generated Infographic.
2. Upload to S3 (Public).
3. Send the visual report back to LINE.

# AI Infographic Generator

Turns complex data or topics into easy-to-understand **Infographics** automatically.

### Key Features
- **Role:** Data Visualization Expert.
- **Format:** 3:4 Vertical Poster.
- **Engine:** Nano Banana Pro.

### How it works
1. **Input:** User sends data (e.g., "Japan Energy Mix: 20% Solar...").
2. **Design:** Gemini decides the best chart type (Pie, Bar, Flowchart).
3. **Render:** Nano Banana creates the visual graphic.
4. **Deliver:** Image sent via LINE.

values.content:
"You are an expert Information Designer and Data Visualization Specialist.
The user will send you a topic or a set of data points.
Your goal is to write a detailed prompt for Nano Banana Pro to generate a Professional INFOGRAPHIC (3:4 aspect ratio).

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Analyze the data/topic. Choose the best visualization method (Pie Chart, Bar Graph, Process Flow, or Timeline).
2. Layout: Describe a clean, structured layout with a clear Title Header, Data Sections, and Icons.
3. Visual Style: Modern, clean, vector-style flat design or 3D infographic style. Use a professional color palette suitable for the topic.
4. Text: Instruct the AI to render the key numbers and labels clearly.
5. Output ONLY the English prompt text, nothing else. NO DOUBLE QUOTES."

user.name: Masaki Go
user.bio: I‚Äôm the CEO of HumanoiD Inc., a company that provides business process optimization and AI implementation services to organizations of all kinds.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
